description:
MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. 
Works well with https://github.com/dcu/mongodb_exporter

If you have the node_exporter running on the mongo instance, you will also get some useful alert panels related to disk io and cpu.

This is an updated version from https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/2583. 

Applicable to Mongo 4.28.

Tested with https://bitnami.com/stack/mongodb/helm

alert.message:
A MongoDB oplog replication has been 5 minutes behind in its replication for more than 15 minutes.
Being able to fail over to a replica of your data is only useful if the data is up to date, so you need to know when thatâ€™s no longer the case!
alert.name: MongoDB Oplog lag alert

alert.message: MongoDB's average disk i/o utilization has been above 98% for 5 minutes
alert.name: MongoDB's Disk IO Utilization alert

title: RW.EventsDB Metrics
